1: I uplift my spirit in joyful praise from all around.
2: I celebrate and uplift the beauty in all creation.
3: I celebrate the beauty of the sun, moon, and stars.
4: I celebrate the beauty of the heavens and the waters above.
5: I celebrate the power of creation and its beauty.
6: I experience lasting stability and unchanging guidance.
7: I celebrate the joy of life and nature all around me.
8: Nature works in harmony to fulfill positive purposes.
9: I appreciate the beauty of mountains, hills, and trees.
10: I appreciate and care for all living creatures around me.
11: All people, leaders, and judges work together for the common good.
12: Everyone, regardless of age or gender, thrives together.
13: I praise the excellent name that brings glory to all.
14: I celebrate the greatness of my community and those close to me.
